idea: In the past have developed reviseonthego suite application for SSC students. 30000 + students used it and got benefited. Current focus is on reimagining a medical prescription. English prescription is mostly incomprehensible by masses. Wrong medication is a cause of many deaths and adverse reactions. My idea is to develop a multimedia prescription in form of video in native language. This video will have images of actual tablets and comprehensive instructions in native languages. Novel concept of Multimedia ontology of medicines is proposed. A patent has been applied for. POC development is WIP.
name: ASKIM TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
White is a turnkey solutions company with a successful track record of delivering projects in different formats including Design & Build Contracts, Main Contracts and Package Contracts. Our experience encompasses serving clients in almost all sectors of business including premium hospitality, commercial, retail and luxury residences. Our strong, varied and in-house capabilities coupled with our long standing relations with consultants, contractors, suppliers and specialised tradesmen help us in delivering you the highest quality service while creating customised, state of art, innovative spaces.


Our Services include:

- Design & Build Contracts

- Main Contract

- Package Contracts

idea: We aim to be one of the largest leadership search firm in India. We are working with some large corporates and looking to scale up the business on a Pan India basis. We specialise in executive search for BFSI & IT clients

idea: The app provides the customer with the local deals and coupons on the everyday products that are active in your locality.
